subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Almost two years after losing his firstborn to an illness, pitcher Pat Neshek, 33, won a roster spot with St. Louis, became a father again and, finally, a first-time All-Star.
snippet: Almost two years after losing his firstborn to an illness, pitcher Pat Neshek, 33, won a roster spot with St. Louis, became a father again and, finally, a first-time All-Star.
